page.title: 15Michael's Busy Day 2
page.content: After lunch I called for Edmund who was cleaning his gun.I said "Are you playing?" and he said yes. His dad said "Try some of this Greek wine." I thought it would be like any other wine. Edmund said "Drink it fast or you won't like it." Then he started laughing. I drank it quick. It tasted of aniseed. About 5 seconds later it really burnt my throat. Then we went to the building site. We only meant to stay for an hour but when I looked at my watch it was 5.30. "Oh no! I'm late," I thought. When I eventually got home my dad looked hard at me and my mum said "What time do you call this?" I said "Sorry," and she said "Alright then." Isaid "Can I go out until 8?" My mum said I could. When I got in dead on 8 I watched the telly until 10 o'clock then went to bed. Michael Connolly 6.7.1985
